attributes.action: instruct every civil servant, from the highest office down, that it is not acceptable to avoid difficult questions by claiming that no spokesperson is available
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the taxpayers pay the Government to make decisions on behalf of the country and we pay the BBC to question these decisions. Both organisations are staffed entirely by civil servants. As such, no Government department, local authority or other public body should be permitted to hide from its responsibilties by claiming that no spokesperson is available. This is dishonest and disrespectful to the people who pay your wages. Remember, you are all answerable to us.
